properties.name: 555 Mission St
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: Western side of Building, street level.
properties.descriptio: This large plaza has several art and landscaping features. It is located in front of 555 Mission Streets and runs along the west side of the building. There are several distinct sitting areas with different styles of seating.

properties.name: Foundry Square NE
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.descriptio: This is one of three plazas fronting the intersection of 1st and Howard, forming Foundary Square. It features art sculptures and seating near a cafe.

properties.name: Foundry Square SE
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.seating_no: 15 chairs, 24 linear seat on  ledge, 45 linear seats on planter boxes sides.
properties.descriptio: This is one of three plazas on the 1st and Howard intersection, forming Foundry Square. This space features a sculpture, landscape, and seating near food services.

properties.name: Foundry Square NW
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.seating_no: 44 linear seating on ledges, 21 seating on planter box, 7 tables 28 chairs
properties.descriptio: This is one of three plazas on the 1st and Howard intersection, forming Foundry Square. This space features a sculpture, landscape, and seating near food services.

properties.name: Intercontinental Hotel_Bay Terrace
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: 6th floor, entrance next to elevator bay
properties.restrooms: Hotel. Could use the lobby restrooms
properties.descriptio: The Intercontinental Hotel provides two POPOS on the fourth and sixth floors. They have various seating arrangements and landscaping, each with views of the City.

properties.name: Intercontinental Hotel_Pacific Terrace
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: 4th floor, turn left from elevator bay, walk beyond convention/meeting rooms, turn left
properties.seating_no: Unknown - seating arranged for private event(s)
properties.restrooms: Hotel. Could use the lobby restrooms etc
properties.descriptio: The Intercontinental Hotel provides two POPOS on the fourth and sixth floors. They have various seating arrangements and landscaping, each with views of the City.

properties.name: 235 Second St
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.landscapin: bamboo, street trees. Indoor park has bushes.
properties.location: urban garden: corner of second and clementina, indoor park ground floor.
properties.accessibil: Direct for plaza. Indirect for indoor park
properties.descriptio: This plaza is located on the corner of 2nd St. and Clementina St. It features several types of seating, served by a cafe.

properties.name: 560 Mission St
properties.source: SPUR, DT Plan 2009
properties.location: Plaza: NE side of building; indoor park/arcade along anthony st.
properties.seating_no: 45 chairs with 15 tables.134 linear seating onl ledges. 10 linear seats on benches
properties.descriptio: This large plaza features a sculpture in a pool of water, a large bamboo grove, and various forms of seating. It is served by a cafe.

properties.name: Marriott Courtyard - A (Starbucks)
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.landscapin: Street trees, planters with bushes, flowers
properties.location: Bench next to entrance setback 15 feet on 2nd Street.  Per Thayer:  Benches on sidewalk setback on Folsom.
properties.seating_no: It appears that one bench near the entrance on 2nd Street is meant to meet this requirement.     Per Thayer:  12 linear seats by bench.
properties.descriptio: Thayer referenced something that is not part of the open space requirement, this is pedestrian improvement requirement.  Per Thayer:  This open space has benches and landscaping along the sidewalk on Folsom at street level.

properties.name: Marriott Courtyard - B (Starbucks)
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.landscapin: Street trees, planters with bushes, flowers
properties.location: Snippet below grade with stair entry on corner of 2nd & Folsom and wheelchair entry on Folsom.
properties.descriptio: This open space has a small sitting space below street level on the corner of Folsom and Second, served by a caf?.

properties.name: Marriott Courtyard - C
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.type: Interior courtyard area - does not appear to be public (see notes)
properties.descriptio: This space features extensive landscaping with several art attractions. Comfortable seating arrangements are located throughout the space. Food service nearby inside the hotel.

properties.name: 101 2nd St
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.seating_no: 25 linear seats on bench/  ledge. 23 tables, 69 chairs
properties.descriptio: This greenhouse features large trees, windows, and art. It has two levels of space and is served by a cafe.

properties.name: 199 Fremont St
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.seating_no: Rock planter box seating. Approx 114 linear seats plus 17 iondividual rocks
properties.descriptio: This large plaza space features extensive rock landscaping and artwork. There are two adjoined areas, one of which has food service.

properties.name: 343 Sansome St
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: 14th floor terrace, and on top of the "old office tower" (could be one and the same). Also behind the building leisendorf street, the street is closed during lunch hours, as was proposed and subsequently permitted.
properties.seating_no: 18 chairs, 50 linear seats on planter box sizes.
properties.descriptio: This fifteenth floor open space has excellent views of surrounding buildings and streets, as well as the San Francisco Bay. It has various types of seating and landscaping. It also has art in the form of a large sundial.

properties.name: Empire Park
properties.source: SPUR, DT Plan 2009
properties.landscapin: Water fountain and lots of plants and shade.
properties.location: Along commercial street and at 642 commercial st
properties.food_servi: There is food service serving the commercial street POPOS, but not directly serving that of Empire park.
properties.seating_no: 15 chairs w/ tables, 8 bench seats in the park, 8 along commercial.
properties.descriptio: Empire park, located at 642 Commercial, is an urban garden that features a water fountain and landscaping. Along Commercial in front of Empire park, there are many widened sidewalk spaces which have benches and landscaping.

properties.name: 100 California St
properties.source: POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: "ground level exterior open space in the form of plazas and walkways"
properties.seating_no: None. Stairs? Some planter box seating but doesn't meet linear seating specs (12'' H and 9'' depth"
properties.descriptio: This is a large plaza with planter boxes, along with smaller spaces along Davis Street. There is also space for food service to serve the plaza in the future.

properties.name: Commercial Street (235 Pine Entitlement)
properties.source: POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: commercial street between montgomery and sansome
properties.type: lunchtime conversion. Commission was satisfied that it met the guidelins.
properties.descriptio: Linear park improvements along Commercial Street feature various types of trees and concrete linear seating. These spaces are served by many caf?s and restaurants along Commercial Street. Additional seating is provided during lunch hours.

properties.name: 120 Howard St
properties.source: POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: interior courtyard between the building and the building adjacent to the east
properties.descriptio: This space features plants along the entirety of the snippet and is served by an espresso cart.

properties.name: 1 Kearny St
properties.source: POPOS Mailing List
properties.landscapin: Hedges and other types of plants.
properties.descriptio: This rooftop terrace has extensive views of Market St. as well as rooftop architecture of nearby buildings. Landscaping and bench seating support this space.

properties.name: 55 Second St - A
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: Located inside the historic building, up a set of 3-4 stairs. Can be accessed through the main lobby (walk past the elevator bay) and through entrances from Jessie and Stevenson Streets.
properties.restrooms: Located in hallway between lobby and indoor park
properties.descriptio: This large, indoor "park" located inside the historia building has a wooden floor, tables with chairs, and large, comfortable leather chairs on a carpeted section near the large window looking out on Stevenson Street.

properties.name: 55 Second St - B
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: The urban garden is at the end of anthony street, at the Jessie Street entrance to the building
properties.restrooms: Located in hallway between lobby and indoor park
properties.descriptio: This space is located outside the rear entry of 55 Second Street. It has planter boxes that serve as seating throughout the plaza.

properties.name: 55 Second St - C
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List

properties.name: Millenium Tower Plaza
properties.source: POPOS Mailing List
properties.accessibil: Indirect for Atrium. Unknown for Plaza
properties.descriptio: This atrium features extensive artwork and is served by a bar/restaurant on the premises. It has various types of seating with tables, and high windows overhead.

properties.name: 77 Van Ness Ave
properties.source: POPOS Mailing List
properties.descriptio: This space is in the front lobby of 77 Van Ness. It has tables and chairs and features a sculpture.

properties.name: 345 California St - A
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: Plaza in front of building main entrance.
properties.descriptio: This open space is provided in the form of a large plaza fronting California Street. Additionally, two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The plaza and east snippet are served by restaurant

properties.name: 345 California St - East B
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: Two snippets on either side of building main entrance, connected by walkway.
properties.seating_no: Bench for ~3 people; 10 chairs w/ tables
properties.descriptio: Two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The west snippet can be entered from Sansome Street, next to the Mandarin Hotel. There is a bench and bamboo in planters. The east snippet is on the B

properties.name: 345 California St - West C
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: Two snippets on either side of building main entrance, connected by walkway.
properties.seating_no: Bench for ~3 people; 10 chairs w/ tables
properties.descriptio: Two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The west snippet can be entered from Sansome Street, next to the Mandarin Hotel. There is a bench and bamboo in planters. The east snippet is on the B

properties.name: Embarcadero Center West 1, 2, & 3
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List, Motion
properties.location: Commercial Street between Drumm and Sansome
properties.seating_no: 30 tables, 107 chairs, plus planter-side seating, benches.
properties.type: Pedestrian walkway on ground and 2nd levels
properties.descriptio: Commercial Street throughout Embarcadero 1, 2, and 3 is a pedestrian mall on ground floor and 2nd level, which is accessed by an elaborate staircase system, flanked by waterfalls. Fountains, foliage, art work, and bench seating found throughout.

properties.name: Rincon Center
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: in the courtyard between 1 and 2 rincon center
properties.seating_no: 78 on benches and chairs. Also, the caf? provides some of its own seating.
properties.descriptio: This large plaza space is found in the interior courtyard between Rincon Center 1 and Rincon Center 2. It features several art sculptures and different types of seating.

properties.name: 123 Mission St
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: plaza in front of the building
properties.descriptio: This large plaza features extensive landscaping and art. Seperate seating areas with seating characterize the area.

properties.name: 150 California St
properties.source: SPUR, DT Plan 2009
properties.seating_no: 40 chairs w/ 10 tables, Linear Seating: only 10'' deep, but approx 82 linear seats
properties.descriptio: This view terrace is located six stories above the street level. There is a large sculpture, long periods of sunlight, and several types of seating. There are extensive views of the surrounding area.

properties.name: 600 California St
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: Northwest side of building, up the stairs from California Street beyond an artistic gateway.
properties.descriptio: A shady open space area with art in the form of sculptures. This snippet found on the northwest side of the building, up the stairs. It adjoins the open space of the adjacent building.

properties.name: Westfield Sky Terrace (Wesfield Center Mall)
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: Roof top, 9th floor. Accessible by elevator in 835 Market St (only 1st elevator goes to 9th floor).
properties.food_servi: None, but food on the premises
properties.descriptio: This extensive 9th floor rooftop space looks onto the dome of the mall and has views westward and sunlight. It does not have direct food service, but food may be found in the food court below in the mall.

properties.name: 100 1st St
properties.source: SPUR, DT Plan 2009, Motion
properties.location: Sun Terrace is on second floor above adjoining parking garage SE of main building. Ground level arcade is on Mission Street side.
properties.hours: Ground level arcade space accessible at all times, Sun Terrace open during daylight hours.
properties.seating_no: 30 seats at 10 tables plus numerous areas to sit along built-in benches and planters, grassy areas.
properties.descriptio: The large Sun Terrace features extensive landscaping and seating. Several art sculptures are featured, along with an elevated view of the street below. There is a 'grand' staircase (snippet) up to the Sun Terrace. Ground level arcade in front of building

properties.name: 200 California St
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.location: In front of building, sidewalk widening
properties.type: Public Sitting Area in Pedestrian Walkway
properties.descriptio: This pedestrian seating area is on a widened sidewalk. Pedestrians may sit on linear seating that forms a planter box. There is a small, public sculpture next to the planter box.

properties.name: 49 Stevenson St
properties.source: SPUR
properties.location: In front of building on Stevenson Street and through a pedestrianized alley to Jessie Street
properties.descriptio: This pedestrian walkway has small fountains and an art sculpture are featured in this space. Plaza seating is available for patrons of Yank Sing restaurant only.

properties.name: Marathon Plaza
properties.source: SPUR
properties.location: In front of building facing Second Street
properties.descriptio: Large, triangular urban garden facing Second Street with a water feature, ample seating, and lush landscaping. Deli and restaurant open to the park provide food and additional seating.

properties.name: 222 2nd St
properties.source: POPOS Mailing List
properties.descriptio: An enclosed open space, with operable floor to ceiling windows and doors; located within the street-level lobby.

properties.name: Gap Building
properties.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
properties.descriptio: This is a large plaza with several seating areas. Art sculptures are featured along with diverse landscaping.

properties.name: 1 Market St
properties.descriptio: Plaza located on Mission Street along the rear of the building. Some planters with benches.

properties.name: 71 Stevenson St
properties.descriptio: The open space connects Stevenson Street and Jessie Street, including planter boxes, a water fountaing, and seating with table outside the cafe.

properties.name: 525 Market St
properties.descriptio: This is a two level open space, with granite wall water fountains at the sidewalk level near Market Street and a view to the landscaped space on the second level.

properties.name: 14 Fremont St
properties.descriptio: This open space is a through walkway between Fremont and 1rst Street that opens into an interior plaza.  A farmers market was operating on location.

properties.name: 456 Montomery St
properties.descriptio: This is a sunken plaza, landscaped with flowers and small water fountains. Escalators are provided to this space.

properties.name: Citygroup Center
properties.descriptio: Built with marble, and covered with glass, this greenhouse provides ample seating and tables.

properties.name: Spear Street Plaza
properties.descriptio: Well landscaped walkway with seating and tables.

properties.name: 25 Jessie St
properties.descriptio: This urban garden include a water feature combined with a tall art piece. Seating available on the ledeges of raised water feature.

properties.name: 201 Spear St
properties.descriptio: Plaza with seating along planters.

properties.name: 135 Main St
properties.descriptio: Interior lobby with seating open business hours only.

properties.name: 301 Howard St
properties.descriptio: Landscaped seating area located kitty-corner to 301 Howard.

properties.name: 444 Market  St
properties.descriptio: Plaza with no seating.

properties.name: 180 Howard St
properties.descriptio: A cul-de-sac walkway with benches at the end.

properties.name: 333 Market St
properties.descriptio: Open plaza with minimal seating on the edge of planters.

properties.name: 595 Market St
properties.descriptio: This plaza is located on 2nd. Street and Stevenson. Seating is only available on the steps beyon the table and seating provided for the food establishment.

properties.name: 221 Main St
properties.descriptio: An open plaza with some seating, landscaping and planters.

properties.name: 211 Main St
properties.descriptio: Open plaza with two benches and a gated children's play area through to Spear Street.

properties.name: 425 Market St
properties.descriptio: An open plaza between buildings with benches, trees and some landscape materials.

properties.name: Redwood Park
properties.descriptio: This extensively landscaped urban park offers redwood trees at the foot of the Transamerica Pyramid. It features, a tall water fountain, sculptures, and ample seating.

properties.name: 50 California St
properties.descriptio: Plaza and wrap around walkway with seating along planters.

properties.name: 100 Pine St
properties.descriptio: This Urban Garden is either accessed through the front entrance of the building or a narrow walkway on Front Street. This space offers water fountains, landscaping, and art.

properties.name: Golden Gate University
properties.descriptio: Concrete seating streches along the passage that connects the recessed entrance of Golden Gate University to the sidewalk on Mission Street.

properties.name: 1 California St
properties.descriptio: Wrap around plaza area with seating near food services.

properties.name: 77 Beale St
properties.descriptio: Plaza with high planters that provide some landscaping but no seating.

properties.name: 1 Post St
properties.descriptio: Snippets surrounding the hexagonal fence of Montgomery Bart Station sunken plaza. This space include concrete steps with some planter boxes.

properties.name: 50 Beale St
properties.descriptio: Large well landscaped plaza with many seating options.

properties.name: 555/557 Market St
properties.descriptio: Extensive landscaping combined with water features signify this space between two high rises. Seating,however, is only availabe to employees.

properties.name: 650 California St
properties.descriptio: This open space is elevated with the street slope. A large art piece represents one entrance to the open space on California Street. This space surrounds the building and offers seating on the ledges of planter boxes.

properties.name: 611 Folsom St
properties.descriptio: Brick plaza with some trees, artwork and seating on brick structures.

properties.name: 201 Mission St
properties.descriptio: Initially hidden from street view there is seating along the building setback area to the right as you walk toward the door.

properties.name: 1 Bush Street
properties.descriptio: This Urban Garden provides a sunken space featuring a water fountain. Space is accessed with stairs from Bush Street and curved walkways from Market street.

properties.name: 505-525 Howard
